card.name: Absorb
card.text: Counter target spell. You gain 3 life.

card.name: Act of Treason
card.text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Aeromunculus
card.text: Flying {2}{G}{U}: Adapt 1. (If this creature has no +1/+1 counters on it, put a +1/+1 counter on it.)

card.name: Amplifire
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a creature card. Until your next turn, Amplifire's base power becomes twice that card's power and its base toughness becomes twice that card's toughness. Put the revealed cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Angelic Exaltation
card.text: Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, it gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of creatures you control.

card.name: Angel of Grace
card.text: Flash Flying When Angel of Grace enters the battlefield, until end of turn, damage that would reduce your life total to less than 1 reduces it to 1 instead. {4}{W}{W}, Exile Angel of Grace from your graveyard: Your life total becomes 10.

card.name: Applied Biomancy
card.text: Choose one or both - • Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. • Return target creature to its owner's hand.

card.name: Archway Angel
card.text: Flying When Archway Angel enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life for each Gate you control.

card.name: Arrester's Admonition
card.text: Return target creature to its owner's hand. Addendum - If you cast this spell during your main phase, draw a card.

card.name: Arrester's Zeal
card.text: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Addendum - If you cast this spell during your main phase, that creature gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: Awaken the Erstwhile
card.text: Each player discards all the cards in their hand, then creates that many 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens.

card.name: Azorius Guildgate
card.text: Azorius Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W} or {U}.

card.name: Azorius Knight-Arbiter
card.text: Vigilance Azorius Knight-Arbiter can't be blocked.

card.name: Azorius Locket
card.text: {T}: Add {W} or {U}. {W/U}{W/U}{W/U}{W/U}, {T}, Sacrifice Azorius Locket: Draw two cards.

card.name: Azorius Skyguard
card.text: Flying, first strike Creatures your opponents control get -1/-0.

card.name: Bankrupt in Blood
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice two creatures. Draw three cards.

card.name: Basilica Bell-Haunt
card.text: When Basilica Bell-Haunt enters the battlefield, each opponent discards a card and you gain 3 life.

card.name: Bedeck // Bedazzle
card.text: Target creature gets +3/-3 until end of turn. --- Destroy target nonbasic land. Bedazzle deals 2 damage to target opponent or planeswalker.

card.name: Bedevil
card.text: Destroy target artifact, creature, or planeswalker.

card.name: Benthic Biomancer
card.text: {1}{U}: Adapt 1. (If this creature has no +1/+1 counters on it, put a +1/+1 counter on it.) Whenever one or more +1/+1 counters are put on Benthic Biomancer, draw a card, then discard a card.

card.name: Biogenic Ooze
card.text: When Biogenic Ooze enters the battlefield, create a 2/2 green Ooze creature token. At the beginning of your end step, put a +1/+1 counter on each Ooze you control. {1}{G}{G}{G}: Create a 2/2 green Ooze creature token.

card.name: Biogenic Upgrade
card.text: Distribute three +1/+1 counters among one, two, or three target creatures, then double the number of +1/+1 counters on each of those creatures.

card.name: Biomancer's Familiar
card.text: Activated abilities of creatures you control cost {2} less to activate. This effect can't reduce the amount of mana an ability costs to activate to less than one mana. {T}: The next time target creature adapts this turn, it adapts as though it had no +1/+1 counters on it.

card.name: Bladebrand
card.text: Target creature gains deathtouch until end of turn. Draw a card.

card.name: Blade Juggler
card.text: Spectacle {2}{B} (You may cast this spell for its spectacle cost rather than its mana cost if an opponent lost life this turn.) When Blade Juggler enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to you and you draw a card.

card.name: Blood Crypt
card.text: ({T}: Add {B} or {R}.) As Blood Crypt enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Bloodmist Infiltrator
card.text: Whenever Bloodmist Infiltrator attacks, you may sacrifice another creature. If you do, Bloodmist Infiltrator can't be blocked this turn.

card.name: Bolrac-Clan Crusher
card.text: {T}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from a creature you control: Bolrac-Clan Crusher deals 2 damage to any target.

card.name: Breeding Pool
card.text: ({T}: Add {G} or {U}.) As Breeding Pool enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Bring to Trial
card.text: Exile target creature with power 4 or greater.

card.name: Burn Bright
card.text: Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Burning-Tree Vandal
card.text: Riot (This creature enters the battlefield with your choice of a +1/+1 counter or haste.) Whenever Burning-Tree Vandal attacks, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.

card.name: Captive Audience
card.text: Captive Audience enters the battlefield under the control of an opponent of your choice. At the beginning of your upkeep, choose one that hasn't been chosen - • Your life total becomes 4. • Discard your hand. • Each opponent creates five 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens.

card.name: Carnival // Carnage
card.text: Carnival deals 1 damage to target creature or planeswalker and 1 damage to that permanent's controller. --- Carnage deals 3 damage to target opponent. That player discards two cards.

card.name: Carrion Imp
card.text: Flying When Carrion Imp enters the battlefield, you may exile target creature card from a graveyard. If you do, you gain 2 life.

card.name: Cavalcade of Calamity
card.text: Whenever a creature you control with power 1 or less attacks, Cavalcade of Calamity deals 1 damage to the player or planeswalker that creature is attacking.

card.name: Charging War Boar
card.text: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.) As long as you control a Domri planeswalker, Charging War Boar gets +1/+1 and has trample. (It can deal excess damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

card.name: Chillbringer
card.text: Flying When Chillbringer enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls. It doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

card.name: Cindervines
card.text: Whenever an opponent casts a noncreature spell, Cindervines deals 1 damage to that player. {1}, Sacrifice Cindervines: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. Cindervines deals 2 damage to that permanent's controller.

card.name: Civic Stalwart
card.text: When Civic Stalwart enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Clamor Shaman
card.text: Riot (This creature enters the battlefield with your choice of a +1/+1 counter or haste.) Whenever Clamor Shaman attacks, target creature an opponent controls can't block this turn.

card.name: Clan Guildmage
card.text: {1}{R}, {T}: Target creature can't block this turn. {2}{G}, {T}: Target land you control becomes a 4/4 Elemental creature with haste until end of turn. It's still a land.

card.name: Clear the Mind
card.text: Target player shuffles their graveyard into their library. Draw a card.

card.name: Clear the Stage
card.text: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn. If you control a creature with power 4 or greater, you may return up to one target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Code of Constraint
card.text: Target creature gets -4/-0 until end of turn. Draw a card. Addendum - If you cast this spell during your main phase, tap that creature and it doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

card.name: Collision // Colossus
card.text: Collision deals 6 damage to target creature with flying. --- Target creature gets +4/+2 and gains trample until end of turn.

card.name: Combine Guildmage
card.text: {1}{G}, {T}: This turn, each creature you control enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it. {1}{U}, {T}: Move a +1/+1 counter from target creature you control onto another target creature you control.

card.name: Concordia Pegasus
card.text: Flying

card.name: Consecrate // Consume
card.text: Exile target card from a graveyard. Draw a card. --- Target player sacrifices a creature with the greatest power among creatures they control. You gain life equal to its power.

card.name: Consign to the Pit
card.text: Destroy target creature. Consign to the Pit deals 2 damage to that creature's controller.

card.name: Cry of the Carnarium
card.text: All creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn. Exile all creature cards in all graveyards that were put there from the battlefield this turn. If a creature would die this turn, exile it instead.

card.name: Cult Guildmage
card.text: {3}{B}, {T}: Target player discards a card. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery. {R}, {T}: Cult Guildmage deals 1 damage to target opponent or planeswalker.

card.name: Dagger Caster
card.text: When Dagger Caster enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to each opponent and 1 damage to each creature your opponents control.

card.name: Dead Revels
card.text: Spectacle {1}{B} (You may cast this spell for its spectacle cost rather than its mana cost if an opponent lost life this turn.) Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Debtors' Transport
card.text: Afterlife 2 (When this creature dies, create two 1/1 white and black Spirit creature tokens with flying.)

card.name: Deface
card.text: Choose one - • Destroy target artifact. • Destroy target creature with defender.

card.name: Depose // Deploy
card.text: Tap target creature. Draw a card. --- Create two 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature tokens with flying, then you gain 1 life for each creature you control.

card.name: Deputy of Detention
card.text: When Deputy of Detention enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls and all other nonland permanents that player controls with the same name as that permanent until Deputy of Detention leaves the battlefield.

card.name: Domri, Chaos Bringer
card.text: +1: Add {R} or {G}. If that mana is spent on a creature spell, it gains riot. (It enters the battlefield with your choice of a +1/+1 counter or haste.) -3: Look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal up to two creature cards from among them and put them into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. -8: You get an emblem with "At the beginning of each end step, create a 4/4 red and green Beast creature token with trample."

card.name: Domri, City Smasher
card.text: +2: Creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain haste until end of turn. -3: Domri, City Smasher deals 3 damage to any target. -8: Put three +1/+1 counters on each creature you control. Those creatures gain trample until end of turn.

card.name: Domri's Nodorog
card.text: Trample When Domri's Nodorog enters the battlefield, you may search your library and/or graveyard for a card named Domri, City Smasher, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you search your library this way, shuffle it.

card.name: Dovin, Architect of Law
card.text: +1: You gain 2 life and draw a card. -1: Tap target creature. It doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step. -9: Tap all permanents target opponent controls. That player skips their next untap step.

card.name: Dovin, Grand Arbiter
card.text: +1: Until end of turn, whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, put a loyalty counter on Dovin, Grand Arbiter. -1: Create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying. You gain 1 life. -7: Look at the top ten cards of your library. Put three of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Dovin's Acuity
card.text: When Dovin's Acuity enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life and draw a card. Whenever you cast an instant spell during your main phase, you may return Dovin's Acuity to its owner's hand.

card.name: Dovin's Automaton
card.text: As long as you control a Dovin planeswalker, Dovin's Automaton gets +2/+2 and has vigilance. (Attacking doesn't cause it to tap.)

card.name: Dovin's Dismissal
card.text: Put up to one target tapped creature on top of its owner's library. You may search your library and/or graveyard for a card named Dovin, Architect of Law, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you search your library this way, shuffle it.

card.name: Drill Bit
card.text: Spectacle {B} (You may cast this spell for its spectacle cost rather than its mana cost if an opponent lost life this turn.) Target player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card.

card.name: Electrodominance
card.text: Electrodominance deals X damage to any target. You may cast a card with converted mana cost X or less from your hand without paying its mana cost.

card.text: {1}{U}, {T}: Tap target creature.

card.name: Emergency Powers
card.text: Each player shuffles their hand and graveyard into their library, then draws seven cards. Exile Emergency Powers. Addendum - If you cast this spell during your main phase, you may put a permanent card with converted mana cost 7 or less from your hand onto the battlefield.

card.text: Enraged Ceratok can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less.

card.text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. Scry 1.

card.text: When Footlight Fiend dies, it deals 1 damage to any target.

card.text: Gates Ablaze deals X damage to each creature, where X is the number of Gates you control.

card.text: {T}, Sacrifice another creature: Search your library for a creature card with converted mana cost equal to 1 plus the sacrificed creature's converted mana cost, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

card.text: Draw four cards, then discard two cards.

card.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {2}.

card.text: Ragefire deals 3 damage to target creature.

card.name: Rakdos, the Showstopper

card.name: Regenesis
